objects.text:
• Pink floral print off-shoulder crop top
• High-waisted light blue denim shorts
• Perfect for casual outings or beach days
• Modern vintage-inspired design

product_details.name: Summer Breeze Floral Off-Shoulder Top & High-Waist Denim Shorts Set
product_details.description:
• Romantic pink floral print off-shoulder crop top with delicate ruffle details
• Elastic neckline for comfortable and secure fit
• Short flutter sleeves with feminine ruffle trim
• High-waisted light blue denim shorts with rolled cuffs
• Elastic waistband with button closure for perfect fit
• Comfortable cotton-blend materials ideal for summer wear
• Versatile two-piece set perfect for casual outings or beach days
• Available in multiple sizes
• Easy-care machine washable fabric
• Modern vintage-inspired design combining classic and contemporary styles

banner_details:
This banner design features a vibrant and modern aesthetic that captures a youthful summer vibe. It is divided into four background color blocks forming a grid, with subtle geometric lines and translucent decorative circles to add visual depth. The [heading] text boldly introduces the theme using a bright pink font, while the [subheading] just below it balances with a calming teal blue. To the lower left, the [description] provides a feature list of the product with clean white bullet points. The [price] is prominently displayed in large, bold white text. A white rounded rectangle [cta_background] with the pink [cta] "Shop Now" button invites interaction. On the right, the [product_image] of a model dressed in the advertised outfit anchors the composition attractively. The overall grid-based structure offers a modern, editorial style suitable for fashion promotions.

**Color Palette**:
- Bright Pink: `#E75480`
- Light Rose: `#FFF0F2` / `#FFF5F7`
- Teal Blue: `#5F9EA0`
- Soft Denim: `#A5CCD1`
- White: `#FFFFFF`
- Accent Pink Background: `#E196A6`
product_color: The product image features a vibrant and summery color palette that can inspire a fresh, youthful advertisement banner. The top is a vivid fuchsia pink (#D9316D) with white floral patterns (#FFFFFF), creating energetic contrast and a visually striking center of focus. The high-waisted denim shorts are a light blue-teal shade (#6DA7A8), offering a calm balance to the bolder top. The model's natural brown hair (#8A5C39) adds warmth, blending harmoniously without overpowering. The overall palette combines bold and soft tones, maintaining focus on the product while achieving contrast and cohesion. This balance can be leveraged to design an eye-catching, colorful banner.
